other_title: 名探偵コナン MAGIC FILE2 工藤新一 謎の壁と黒ラブ事件 (Japanese)
plot: A man came to Shinichi on a Sunday morning in a park asking if Shinichi saw him last Thursday at the same time. He explains to Shinichi that on that Thursday morning his grandmother died, and the police suspects him to be her killer. But the man insists that he was in the park at that time. Shinichi, becoming interested in the case, insists to help him find an alibi and prove to the two detectives guarding the man that he indeed was telling the truth.
